#summary MacSim-DRAMSim2

[http://www.ece.umd.edu/dramsim/ DRAMSim2] has been integrated with MacSim for more detailed DRAM simulation.


= How to use DRAMSim2 with MacSim =

Specify DRAMSim2 option during build process.
{{{
./build.py --dramsim
}}}

Or you can specify in macsim.config file
{{{
[Library]
dram: 1
}}}

During build process, DRAMSim2 source code files will be downloaded from DRAMSim2's repository if the directory does not exist.
